Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Hulking \Hulk"ing\, Hulky \Hulk"y\, a. Bulky; unwiedly; of great size and bulk; ponderous. [R.] ``A huge hulking fellow.'' --H. Brooke. [1913 Webster]
hulking adj : of great size and bulk; "a hulking figure of a man"; "three hulking battleships" [syn: {hulky}]
